trans-unit.source: Represents a range of dates in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 中的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> objects are primarily used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection> to specify a range of dates that are not selectable in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> 主要用物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection>指定不能在選取的日期範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> objects to specify which dates in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>物件，指定的日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>無法選取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The date to add.
trans-unit.target: 要新增的日期。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> class with a single date.
trans-unit.target: 使用單一日期初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The start of the range to be represented.
trans-unit.target: 要表示之範圍的開始。

trans-unit.source: The end of the range to be represented.
trans-unit.target: 要表示之範圍的結束。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> class with a range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用日期範圍初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last date in the represented range.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示之範圍內的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: The last date in the represented range.
trans-unit.target: 表示之範圍內的最後一個日期。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *dateTimeString*
trans-unit.target: *dateTimeString*

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> objects to specify which dates in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>物件，指定的日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>無法選取。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first date in the represented range.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示之範圍內的第一個日期。

trans-unit.source: The first date in the represented range.
trans-unit.target: 表示之範圍內的第一個日期。

trans-unit.target: *dateTimeString*

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> objects to specify which dates in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>物件，指定的日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>無法選取。
